mapper.sql: host_id, host_title, host_title_http, host_tu, host_time, hoat_from, host_weibo_text, host_weibo_text_http, host_surltext, host_weibo_text_http1, host_tu2, host_weibo_text3, host_tu4, host_mboxcol, host_time5, host_mdiybtn, host_mdiybtn6, host_mdiybtn7, host_topic, host2, type
mapper.select: select host_id, host_title, host_title_http, host_tu, host_time, hoat_from, host_weibo_text, host_weibo_text_http, host_surltext, host_weibo_text_http1, host_tu2, host_weibo_text3, host_tu4, host_mboxcol, host_time5, host_mdiybtn, host_mdiybtn6, host_mdiybtn7, host_topic, host2, type from host where host_id = #{hostId}
mapper.insert: insert into host(host_title, host_title_http, host_tu, host_time, hoat_from, host_weibo_text, host_weibo_text_http, host_surltext, host_weibo_text_http1, host_tu2, host_weibo_text3, host_tu4, host_mboxcol, host_time5, host_mdiybtn, host_mdiybtn6, host_mdiybtn7, host_topic, host2, type) values (#{hostTitle}, #{hostTitleHttp}, #{hostTu}, #{hostTime}, #{hoatFrom}, #{hostWeiboText}, #{hostWeiboTextHttp}, #{hostSurltext}, #{hostWeiboTextHttp1}, #{hostTu2}, #{hostWeiboText3}, #{hostTu4}, #{hostMboxcol}, #{hostTime5}, #{hostMdiybtn}, #{hostMdiybtn6}, #{hostMdiybtn7}, #{hostTopic}, #{host2}, #{type})

(#{entity.hostTitle}, #{entity.hostTitleHttp}, #{entity.hostTu}, #{entity.hostTime}, #{entity.hoatFrom}, #{entity.hostWeiboText}, #{entity.hostWeiboTextHttp}, #{entity.hostSurltext}, #{entity.hostWeiboTextHttp1}, #{entity.hostTu2}, #{entity.hostWeiboText3}, #{entity.hostTu4}, #{entity.hostMboxcol}, #{entity.hostTime5}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn6}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn7}, #{entity.hostTopic}, #{entity.host2}, #{entity.type})

(#{entity.hostTitle}, #{entity.hostTitleHttp}, #{entity.hostTu}, #{entity.hostTime}, #{entity.hoatFrom}, #{entity.hostWeiboText}, #{entity.hostWeiboTextHttp}, #{entity.hostSurltext}, #{entity.hostWeiboTextHttp1}, #{entity.hostTu2}, #{entity.hostWeiboText3}, #{entity.hostTu4}, #{entity.hostMboxcol}, #{entity.hostTime5}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn6}, #{entity.hostMdiybtn7}, #{entity.hostTopic}, #{entity.host2}, #{entity.type})
on duplicate key update host_title = values(host_title), host_title_http = values(host_title_http), host_tu = values(host_tu), host_time = values(host_time), hoat_from = values(hoat_from), host_weibo_text = values(host_weibo_text), host_weibo_text_http = values(host_weibo_text_http), host_surltext = values(host_surltext), host_weibo_text_http1 = values(host_weibo_text_http1), host_tu2 = values(host_tu2), host_weibo_text3 = values(host_weibo_text3), host_tu4 = values(host_tu4), host_mboxcol = values(host_mboxcol), host_time5 = values(host_time5), host_mdiybtn = values(host_mdiybtn), host_mdiybtn6 = values(host_mdiybtn6), host_mdiybtn7 = values(host_mdiybtn7), host_topic = values(host_topic), host2 = values(host2), type = values(type)
mapper.update:
update host
host_title = #{hostTitle},
host_title_http = #{hostTitleHttp},
host_tu = #{hostTu},
host_time = #{hostTime},
hoat_from = #{hoatFrom},
host_weibo_text = #{hostWeiboText},
host_weibo_text_http = #{hostWeiboTextHttp},
host_surltext = #{hostSurltext},
host_weibo_text_http1 = #{hostWeiboTextHttp1},
host_tu2 = #{hostTu2},
host_weibo_text3 = #{hostWeiboText3},
host_tu4 = #{hostTu4},
host_mboxcol = #{hostMboxcol},
host_time5 = #{hostTime5},
host_mdiybtn = #{hostMdiybtn},
host_mdiybtn6 = #{hostMdiybtn6},
host_mdiybtn7 = #{hostMdiybtn7},
host_topic = #{hostTopic},
host2 = #{host2},
type = #{type},
where host_id = #{hostId}
